page.title: 14Age Concern
page.content: Mr.S was born at Newmills.He has lived here for 39 years but moved away for a time to find work.He came back because it is a very beautiful countryside and he said that he went to school here in 1910.Mr.W has been living here for 67 years.Mr.W no longer enjoys living here because of his recent bereavement.Mrs.H was born in Davidstowe.She came here 6 years ago.She enjoys living here because the people are friendly.In her spare time she does gardening,knitting and makes toys.Mrs.C was born in Bow and lived in London for 56 years.She enjoys living here because everyone is kind.She does sewing and makes jumpers and blankets for the old and takes her dog for a walk.Cornwall is considered a retirement area.
